Modul model

Package de.kaiser.model.style

package de.kaiser.model.style
Contains the data models for defining layouts, styles, and design properties.

This package is at the heart of visual design. It defines how documents and their individual elements (paragraphs, tables, etc.) are displayed. The central class is the StyleSheet, which bundles all style information.

Architectural Concepts

  1. Layout Definitions:
    • PageMasterStyle: Defines the layout of a single page (size, margins, header/footer areas).
    • PageSequenceMaster: Defines the sequence of page layouts (e.g., for the first page, even/odd pages).
  2. Element Styles:
    • ElementStyle: The central class that associates a name (e.g., "important-paragraph") with a set of properties.
    • ElementBlockStyleProperties: An quasi-abstract base class for all property sets regarding a block element. Each concrete element (e.g., Paragraph, Table) has its own subclass to define specific attributes.
    • InlineElementStyleProperties: An quasi-abstract base class for all property sets regarding an inline element. Each concrete element (e.g., Text-Run, Footnote) has its own subclass to define specific attributes.
  3. Text Styles (formerly Font Styles):
    • TextStyle: A named, reusable style (e.g., "headline-font") that combines a font family with size, weight, and style. These are referred to by the EElementStyleProperties to control typography.
  4. Style Resolution:
    • StyleResolverContext: An object that maintains state (e.g., the map of all available styles and the style of the current parent element) during the processing process to enable the correct inheritance of styles.
Seit:
1.0
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    BlockImageStyleProperties
     
    ElementBlockStyleProperties
    Represents a set of style properties that can be applied to an element.
    ElementStyle
    Represents a single, named style definition in the stylesheet.
    ElementStyleProperties
    An abstract class representing style properties for an element.
    FootnoteStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for the body of a footnote element.
    HeadlineStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for a headline element.
    InlineElementStyleProperties
    A class representing style properties for inline elements.
    InlineTextElementStyleProperties
    An abstract class representing style properties for inline text elements.
    LayoutTableStyleProperties
     
    ListStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for a list element.
    PageMasterStyle
    Represents the styling properties for a page layout in the document.
    PageMasterStyle.PageSize
    Defines standard ISO page sizes.
    PageSequenceMaster
     
    ParagraphStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for a paragraph element.
    PartStyleProperties
     
    SectionStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for a section element.
    StyleResolverContext
    A context object that holds the state during the recursive style resolution process.
    StyleSheet
    Represents the root stylesheet, containing font definitions, font styles, element styles, and page layouts.
    StyleTargetTypes
    Defines the available 'target-element' constants for style definitions.
    TableCellStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for a table cell (fo:table-cell).
    TableStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for a table element (fo:table).
    TextBlockStyleProperties
    Abstract base class for all block-level text elements.
    TextRunStyleProperties
    Concrete style properties for an inline text run element.
    TextStyle
    Represents a named font style that can be referenced by elements.
